title: Pixel 5 no haptic on recent apps gesture
content:
I am using gesture navigation on my Pixel 5 and when I slide up and hold from the bottom to open the Recent Apps, there is no haptic feedback.

I tested this on a Pixel 4XL and there's definitely a haptic feedback.

They are both on android 11.

Is anyone else experiencing this?
What can I do to fix this?
